title.narrative: Ulaanbaatar Urban Services and Ger Areas Development Investment Program - Tranche 2

description.narrative: Tranche 2 of the multitranche financing facility will (i) extend the urban infrastructure upgrading and spatial restructuring to two additional subcenters in the northern ger areas, namely Dambadarjaa and Denjiin, and provide additional investments in Selbe and Bayankhoshuu subcenters under Tranche 1; (ii) support the delivery of socioeconomic facilities; and (iii) further improve institutional strengthening and capacity building.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
2 heating facilities with 156.0 MW capacity and 6.0 km of heating network pipes constructed (2015 baseline: 18 heating facilities with 7 MW)
